turkish_example_sentence: O avukata hukuki konuyu sormasa, yanlış karar verebilir.
english_example_sentence: If she were not to ask the lawyer about the legal matter, she could make a wrong decision.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы она не спросила адвоката о правовом вопросе, она могла бы принять неправильное решение.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O avukata hukuki konuyu ______, yanlış karar verebilir.
